meanings.definition: A colorless crystalline compound, (C6H5)3CH, used in the manufacture of dyes and pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: The scientist synthesized triphenylmethane in the lab for the new dye production.
meanings.sent2: The factory imported a large quantity of triphenylmethane for their pharmaceutical manufacturing process.
meanings.sent3: The playful cat knocked over a container of triphenylmethane, creating a colorful mess in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like triphenylmethane, adding vibrant hues to the otherwise dull project.
meanings.sent5: The students marveled at the beauty of triphenylmethane crystals under the microscope.
